title: Contrast on mobile app got much worse
creator: spartanhooah
content: One of the recent updates mentioned something about changing the colors for read vs unread emails. Now the contrast between the two states is barely perceptible, whereas before it was fairly clear (at least when using the dark theme; I have checked both themes on the current version and they both suffer). Is there a better forum to provide this feedback?

title: Spam in Thunderbird for Android
creator: markclemow
content: Is there a plan to replicate the desktop spam filter in android? My ISP does not filter spam, but the desktop Thunderbird takes care of 95% of them. In Android, they just appear in my inbox and I have to manually delete them. Most days I get around 30 spam emails, ss it's a pain. I'd very much like to have the same experience with spam in android as I have in desktop.

title: manual account configuration in Thunderbird for Android
creator: marco.prandini
content: Is there a way to actually perform a fully manual configuration? I want to use TB for reading a personal IMAP archival server. I could not find a way to skip the test for SMTP, that I do not need. Thanks

title: Thunderbird for Android/Phone
creator: dfuentes33024
content: Hello! It seems like Thunderbird must have updated on my phone and somehow my Sent folder is now not only empty but no longer syncs with email account. It worked perfectly fine until just the other day and now I can't tell what needs to be changed in my settings since I don't know what caused the problem! :( I've tried resyncing, cache clearing and force stopping but I can't think of what else I should do. Any help is greatly appreciated! Thank you.
